Article Title: Early detection and rehabilitation. A specific device for care and integration in the community
Abstract: Ultra high Risk subjects who might develop a psychosis or subjects having a first episode of psychosis experience very early a cognitive deficit in neurocognition as well as social cognition. The crucial question for these adolescents is the social and professional integration. Nowadays, specific care device have to be developed in France such as cognitive remediation as well as psychoeducation. However, other psychosocial dimensions such as adapted physical activities or supported employment turns out essential. This population, who is very familiar with internet and social networks, is also very difficult to become compliant with care. Care centers for early detection and rehabilitation have to build an. integrative and coordinated network including sectors device and specific social units devoted to these subjects, with special effort to enhance case management and job coaching. (C) 2017 Elsevier Masson SAS. All rights reserved.
